sentences: Mireille Delunsch (born 2 November 1962) is a French soprano.
She was born in Mulhouse, and studied musicology and voice at the Conservatoire de Strasbourg.
Her debut was at the Opéra national du Rhin in Mulhouse, in Mussorgsky's Boris Godunov.

Fisch-Ton-Kan by Emmanuel Chabrier, conducted by Roger Delage (1992, Arion)Delunsch has also appeared in a number of opera telecasts.
